Name: Splanchnic Mesoderm
Description: Foregut organogenesis dataset showing interactions between splanchnic mesoderm and definitive endoderm

Name: Primitive Streak
Description: Gastrulation dataset analyzing EMT programs during endodermal and mesodermal specification

Name: Schwann Cell Precursor
Description: Neural crest cell atlas describing diversification of glial-cell lineages from neurulation to adulthood

Name: Neuromesodermal Progenitor
Description: Developmental dataset describing bipotent neuromesodermal progenitors in the elongating caudal trunk

Name: Embryonic Hindlimb
Description: Embryonic hindlimb atlas focusing on spatial and temporal gene expression programs

Name: Cranial Neural Crest
Description: Neural crest cell dataset showing the bifurcation between cranial mesenchyme and neural crest

Name: Curated Cancer Cell Atlas
Description: Cancer atlas containing 70+ curated single-cell datasets spanning >100 cancer subtypes
